Reviews.Title: “Good location, small but comfortable rooms, average service.”
Reviews.Author: CarlosBrighton
Reviews.Content: booked via agent hoo ha reservation causing concern tidied bed remained unmade overall quiet comfortable reasonable price breakfast continental breakfast location museums trams town overall fancy

Reviews.Title: “Extremley Overpriced”
Reviews.Author: RobL101
Reviews.Content: stayed beginning july attending white sensation party arena paid 2 nights utterly exorbitant price 2 nights hotel average extremley dated hotel front desk border line obnoxious boot paid extra late check late flight sunday evening day leaving told vacate move suit guys purely suit cleaning schedule acceptable locked stuff changeover completely hungover tired waited extremley rude desk door card initial lift wait reception sorted guts hour stay

Reviews.Title: “Too expensive!”
Reviews.Author: oberd2000
Reviews.Content: dusty telephone tv mirror pictures 2 lamps beside bed repair bad lightning tiny bathroom bent washbasin burned backside heater breakfast poor coffee type sausage type cheese green scrambled eggs bacon hot sausages cornflakes jam 3 types juice plus hotel friendly stuff quiet situated nice region near vondel park concertgebouw museums night expensive

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: AmbushStockport
Reviews.Content: omega hotel location museums picking tram centre city hotel average hotel cleaner definitely lick paint looked tired shabby bed comfortable pillows rock hard sleeping shower hot staff hotel polite helpful leave bags reception ready pick late afternoon breakfast inspiring dark tables chairs reminded refectory school breakfast items okay bread croissants jams cheese ham avoid scrambled eggs sausages awful oh mention church clock chimes half hour added stay sleep stay hotel stay lovely nice food drink cheery welcome try bar round corner tram stop

Reviews.Title: “Good location, small room, breakfast in the garden and problem with internet connection”
Reviews.Author: ievaliene
Reviews.Content: hotel location close main attractions vondelpark time quiet close tram stop central station bells church didnt disturb church reconstruction staff polite hadnt staff solve breakfast buffett wide breaksfast minute closing nice garden meet cat loved breakfast cheese double shower wc clean comfortable heating lamps internet mornings evenings overall recommend hotel cheap hotel

Reviews.Title: “Amsterdam great city : great people.”
Reviews.Author: shamrocks_11
Reviews.Content: omega hotel warrent 3 hotel status 2 boarding house mark closer mark lick paint carpeting furniture amiss arrival found safe didnt battery replacement happens guest experienced identical maybe normal clientele safe users management attentive customer expectations bit suspect plus 2 tram stop conveniently close day started hot buffet style breakfast flavoured grilled bacon

Reviews.Title: “An nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: tony789
Reviews.Content: check thats reading reviews alittle unsure found little bar time late night people wont serive map map stayed 1 heating weather hot complain sit pick faults hotels somewere sleep night stay cheap hotel clean close tram station selection shops close including mcdonalds coffeshops red tram goes 1 hour pass 260 day pass 700 fast trams stop dont wait

Reviews.Title: “Good and clean 3* hotel close to musuem square and with convinient transportation :) Go”
Reviews.Author: Tina_Athens_Greece
Reviews.Content: location close museum square 2 tram stops close hotel direct connection main attractions central station clean toilet linens heating satisfactory breakfast ok am 160 tv remote control didnt care didnt spend time hotel asleep internet lobby costs 3 euros hour expensive normally free didnt hear church bell

Reviews.Title: “Omega is not the last word (letter) in comfort and class.”
Reviews.Author: alexandercara
Reviews.Content: book omega hotel specify twin space comfortable movement changed night staffing service haphazard coming 9pm found bar closed told kitchen own tea drink facilities bedrooms wardrobe clothes hanger doss couple nights isnt bad dont expect luxury

Reviews.Title: “Great location, good hotel”
Reviews.Author: strongy39
Reviews.Content: stayed friends weekend happy omega described previous reviews breakfast nice comfortable location excellent staff polite friendly definately look omega travelling amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for!”
Reviews.Author: Tazcharlie
Reviews.Content: husband stayed omega nights celebrate 40th birthday stayed overlooking rear garden church bells bother bit dated shabby 2 nights adequate staff friendly effort bottle tops money albeit 12am book breakfast eat attempting breakfast worth money informed shuttle bus airport airport 1350 euros actual 15 euros person extra cash omega ideal spot main city close walk tram stop 2 minute walk looking cheap short stay fussed decor hospitality ideal

Reviews.Title: “Get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: mikeyandfiona
Reviews.Content: stay found staff fairly welcoming polite helpful except breakfast blonde woman glasses rude croissants coming trip dam directions reception lost luckily found map city door told werent location wasnt bad map city 30 mins walking wary trams breakfast fine expect options basic cosy honest dont amsterdam sit lengths recommend people bad experiences church bells didnt effect bit added excitement city

Reviews.Title: “DO NOT GO TO THIS HOTEL!”
Reviews.Author: bentley_hotelnyc
Reviews.Content: worst hotel girlfriend stayed staff lot happier didnt guest people met disgusting outer bed throws hadnt seen washing machine hotel towels holes covered stains tv surface dust foor vacum cleaner double wasnt twin beds arranged shape letter tiny please please ignore positive comments hotel bad ruin stay trust

HotelInfo.Name: Omega Hotel Amsterdam
HotelInfo.Address: Jacob Obrechtstraat 33, Museum Quarter, Amsterdam 1071 KG, The Netherlands
